mdRecord.dcterms:title: The spring time of year is coming: ballad / sung by Mr. Sinclair ; words and melody by C. Thompson
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, C.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: First line: The spring time of year is coming, coming.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: M1 .S444 v.104 no.37: Sheet music collection, v. 104, no. 37]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: M1 .S444 v. 177 no.1: 35 cm. First title in a volume of sheet music from the collection of Septima A. Randolph, with her name on red morocco label on front cover. Presentation inscr. to her from her friend, Ann McKim Bowle. One of two volumes of sheet music from the Papers of the Meikleham family, MSS 7007. Search by call number to retrieve all titles in the volume.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Songs with piano
